column4: Is there any way to get better MTP support under Ubuntu 12.04? Currently, my Android phone takes about 30 seconds to connect to my Ubuntu box, and after that, I get 3MBps of thoughput at most. This is compared quite low compared to Windows 7 laptop that mounts my Gnex ~instantly, and offers ~12MBps of throughput
I heard there were some problems with MTP support but it was supposed to be solved way before 12.04 was released
